info.name: Folder Protection
info.summary: Protect folders from being moved, copied, or deleted
info.description: Prevents specific folders from being moved, copied, or deleted to avoid server performance issues with large folders.
info.author: Ricardo

property.name: is-protected
property.description: Indicates if the folder is protected from modifications

property.name: protection-reason
property.description: Reason why the folder is protected

property.name: is-deletable
property.description: Indicates if the folder can be deleted

property.name: is-renameable
property.description: Indicates if the folder can be renamed

property.name: is-moveable
property.description: Indicates if the folder can be moved
